content: At the moment there are some issues in which very positive feedback has been given to realize these. How do we decide if we are going to set something? Two examples are Rename Alloc to AllocHandle and Remove Alloc::{alloc,dealloc}_array APIs. How do we proceed here? Should we do a FCP? If so, who should be linked for checkboxes?
This is somewhat new territory. I’ll add to the libs team agenda to discuss this. (Next meeting is on the 15th)
One problem we have is that some of the issues are kind of tied together. Like Dealloc and AllocFrom.

I’ve filed https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-allocators/issues/20

Thanks! How do we decide on this issue though? :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
